history.proof: intros x eps. unfold locally_norm. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

original: intros x eps. unfold locally_norm. exists (mkposreal (norm (minus x x)) _). intros y H. unfold ball_norm in H. rewrite <- minus_zero_x in H. unfold norm at 1 in H. unfold minus at 1 in H. rewrite plus_zero_r in H. rewrite Rminus_0_r in H. apply H.
